headline: JCP&L's EnergizeNJ Infrastructure Upgrade Program Approved by New Jersey Board of Public Utilities
summary: Jersey Central Power & Light (JCP&L), a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. (NYSE: FE), is set to expand smart grid technology across its northern and central New Jersey service territory following approval from the New Jersey Board of Public Utilities (BPU) for its EnergizeNJ infrastructure investment program (IIP).

headline: CenterPoint Energy Q1 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenues Improve Y/Y
summary: CNP's first-quarter earnings miss estimates, while revenues rise year over year by 11.5%. The company's 2025 EPS outlook remains unchanged.

headline: CMS Energy Q1 Earnings Miss Estimates, Revenue Increase Y/Y
summary: CMS' first-quarter earnings miss the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 2.9%. However, its top line increases 12.5% from the year-ago quarter.
